      • setMainClassName

        public SparkSpecification.Builder.AfterDescription setMainClassName(String mclassName)
        Sets the Spark job main class name in specification. The main method of this class will be called to run the Spark job
        Parameters:
        mclassName - the fully qualified name of class containing the main method
        Returns:
        An instance of SparkSpecification.Builder.AfterDescription.
